00011   typedef enum{
00012     ACCEPTOR_ACCEPTOR = ACCEPTOR + ACCEPTOR,
00013     ACCEPTOR_DONOR = ACCEPTOR + DONOR,
00014     ACCEPTOR_DONEPTOR = ACCEPTOR + DONEPTOR,
00015     DONOR_DONOR = DONOR + DONOR,
00016     DONOR_DONEPTOR = DONOR + DONEPTOR,
00017     DONEPTOR_DONEPTOR = DONEPTOR + DONEPTOR,
00018     ACCEPTOR_METAL_1 = ACCEPTOR + METAL_1,
00019     ACCEPTOR_METAL_2 = ACCEPTOR + METAL_2,
00020     DONEPTOR_METAL_1 = DONEPTOR + METAL_1,
00021     DONEPTOR_METAL_2 = DONEPTOR + METAL_2
00022   }interactionSum;
00023   
00025   typedef enum{
00026     NO_FLIP = 0,
00027     FLIP_NBR_Y, 
00028     FLIP_ACC_Y,
00029     FLIP_Z
00030   }local_coord_flip;

00033   typedef struct{
00034     residue_type residue;           
00035     atom_type atoms[3];             
00036     const my_float_t* local_H_pos;  
00037   }sidechain_donor_t;
00038   typedef std::map<atom_type, const sidechain_donor_t*> SC_tbl_atom_lvl;
00039   typedef std::map<residue_type, SC_tbl_atom_lvl> SC_tbl_res_lvl;

00043     residue_type residue;

00046   }sidechain_preacc_t;
00047   typedef std::map<atom_type, const sidechain_preacc_t*> preacc_tbl_atom_lvl;
00048   typedef std::map<residue_type, preacc_tbl_atom_lvl> preacc_tbl_res_lvl;

00051   HbondGeometry()

00057   ~HbondGeometry() {;}
00058 
00059   static inline bool
00060   salt_bridge(const atom_t &A, const atom_t &B, const my_float_t sq_dist)
00061   {
00062     // Due to the nature of His ND1, we do not know whether it is protonated.
00063     // However, it can only participate in a salt bridge if it has a proton,
00064     // and then as the positive component.
00065     interactionType A_act_type = A.act_type;
00066     if(A.res == HIS && A.name == ND1) A_act_type = DONOR;
00067     interactionType B_act_type = B.act_type;
00068     if(B.res == HIS && B.name == ND1) B_act_type = DONOR;
00069     // If the charges have opposite sign they will be negative when
00070     // multiplied.  Otherwise the product will be greater than or equal to 0.0
00071     if(MIN_SALT_BRIDGE_SQUARED_LENGTH <= sq_dist &&
00072        sq_dist <= MAX_SALT_BRIDGE_SQUARED_LENGTH &&
00073        is_hbond_interaction(A_act_type, B_act_type) && 
00074        A.charge * B.charge < 0.0)
00075       return true;
00076     return false;
00077   } 
00078 
00079   static inline bool
00080   is_hbond_interaction(interactionType A_act, interactionType B_act)
00081   {
00082     int act_sum = A_act + B_act;
00083     if(act_sum == ACCEPTOR_DONOR || act_sum == ACCEPTOR_DONEPTOR ||
00084        act_sum == DONOR_DONEPTOR || act_sum == DONEPTOR_DONEPTOR) return true;
00085     return false; 
00086   }
00087 
00089   static inline bool
00090   metal_hbond(const atom_t &polar_atom, const atom_t &metal, 
00091               const my_float_t sq_dist)
00092   {
00093     if((polar_atom.act_type == ACCEPTOR || polar_atom.act_type == DONEPTOR) &&
00094        ((metal.act_type == METAL_1 && 
00095          sq_dist <= PDB_metals::MAX_METAL_1_SQUARED_LENGTH) ||
00096         (metal.act_type == METAL_2 && 
00097          sq_dist <= PDB_metals::MAX_METAL_2_SQUARED_LENGTH)))
00098       return true;
00099     return false;
00100   }
00101 
00103   static inline bool
00104   metal_salt_bridge(const atom_t &polar_atom, const atom_t &metal, 
00105                     const my_float_t sq_dist)
00106   {
00107     // Due to the nature of His ND1, we do not know whether it is protonated.
00108     // However, it can only participate in a salt bridge if it has a proton,
00109     // and then as the positive component.
00110     if(polar_atom.res == HIS && polar_atom.name == ND1) return false;
00111 
00112     // the metal distance checks are not needed since we should always call
00113     // metal_hbond first and not call this function if metal_hbond is true,
00114     if(sq_dist <= MAX_SALT_BRIDGE_SQUARED_LENGTH && polar_atom.charge != 0 &&
00115        (polar_atom.act_type == ACCEPTOR || polar_atom.act_type == DONEPTOR) &&
00116        ((metal.act_type == METAL_1 && 
00117          sq_dist > PDB_metals::MAX_METAL_1_SQUARED_LENGTH) ||
00118         (metal.act_type == METAL_2 && 
00119          sq_dist > PDB_metals::MAX_METAL_2_SQUARED_LENGTH)))
00120       return true;
00121     return false;
00122   }

00194  
00195   static const sidechain_donor_t*
00196   get_sidechain_donor(residue_type res, atom_type atom)
00197   {
00198     if(!A_SC_donors.size()) build_SC_donor_tables();
00199     SC_tbl_res_lvl::const_iterator res_iter = A_SC_donors.find(res);
00200     if(res_iter == A_SC_donors.end()) return 0;
00201     SC_tbl_atom_lvl::const_iterator atom_iter = res_iter->second.find(atom);
00202     if(atom_iter == res_iter->second.end()) return 0;
00203     return atom_iter->second;
00204   }
00205 
00206   static const sidechain_preacc_t*
00207   get_sidechain_preacc(residue_type res, atom_type atom)
00208   {
00209     if(!A_SC_preaccs.size()) build_SC_preacc_tables();
00210     preacc_tbl_res_lvl::const_iterator res_iter = A_SC_preaccs.find(res);
00211     if(res_iter == A_SC_preaccs.end()) return 0;
00212     preacc_tbl_atom_lvl::const_iterator atom_iter = res_iter->second.find(atom);
00213     if(atom_iter == res_iter->second.end()) return 0;
00214     return atom_iter->second;
00215   }
